sentence.Network_en: We're unwitting victims of the system.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们都是该系统的不知情的受害者。

sentence.Network_en: He became an unwitting accomplice in the crime.
sentence.Network_cn: 他糊里糊涂地成了犯罪的帮凶。

sentence.Network_en: She was the unwitting tool of the swindlers.
sentence.Network_cn: 她不知不觉地被这些诈骗犯所利用,成了他们的工具.

list.abs: travellers have been questioned at airports in an effort to detect unwitting virus carriers .为了查出不知情的病毒携带者，游客们在机场将会受到询问。
both would create a Consumer Financial Protection Agency ( CFPA ) designed to shield unwitting consumers from abusive industry practices .双方将建立一个保护消费者金融局（发展局)，旨在免受虐待行业惯例不知情的消费者。
An unwitting mistake may be overlooked., 一个无意识的错误可能被忽视了.
an unintended slight ; an unintentional pun ; the offense was unintentional ; an unwitting mistake may be overlooked .无心的怠慢；无意识双关语；那过错不是故意的；一个无心的过错也许会被原谅。
my unwitting interruption of their private conversation ., 我无意中打断他们的私下谈话.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English unwitende 'not knowing or realizing' (see un-, wit)

encyclopedia.content: 形容词 a. 1. not aware of what you are doing or of the situation you are involved in 不知情的 2. 不知不觉的；无意的 3.If you describe a person or their actions as unwitting, you mean that the person does something or is involved in something without realizing it. 4.同义词：unconscious, involuntary, unaware, unintentional, inadvertent 5.网络释义： A.unintentional: not done with purpose or intent; &

entry.tran: 不知情的；不知不觉的；无意的
entry.def: If you describe a person or their actions as unwitting, you mean that the person does something or is involved in something without realizing it.

example.ex: We're unwitting victims of the system...
example.tran: 我们都是该系统的不知情的受害者。

example.ex: It had been an unwitting blunder on Blair's part.
example.tran: 它曾是布莱尔的无心之失。
